PHRASE.LANG: Who would have guessed that the medical field would introduce a fashionable piece of clothing. [#Legal]
Qui aurait jamais cru que le domaine médical lancerait une nouvelle mode ? [#Legal]
Wer hätte gedacht, dass die Medizin einmal so ein modisches Kleidungsstück hervorbringt. [#Legal]
Chi avrebbe mai detto che l'abbigliamento medico sarebbe stato di moda?
¿Quién hubiera imaginado que el campo de la medicina nos daría una prenda tan de moda? [#Legal]
Who would have guessed that the medical field would introduce a fashionable piece of clothing. [#Legal]
